name: Ephemeral Assailant
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create an illusory duplicate of a creature you can see within range. The duplicate appears anywhere within 10 feet of your target. It takes its turns after yours.

The duplicate is an exact copy of the creature, except that it can't cast spells and deals half damage, and all damage dealt is psychic damage. If it takes any damage, deals any damage, or is targeted by a spell, it vanishes.
empower: Creates two duplicates of the target.
